prompt_base: hyperdetailed cinematic portrait of an imposing elder wizard, massive curved demonic horns, long flowing white beard and hair, wrinkled pale blue skin, menacing red eyes, wearing ancient, tattered mystical robes
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme detail on skin texture and wrinkles, realistic white beard and hair strands, subtle volumetric lighting defining muscle mass, sharp focus on horns and eyes
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, blue fur, blurry beard, toy, flat lighting, low quality, deformed horns, simple robes
